body: Hi All, I've always had good luck here, so I'll try another one. I´m trying to run a daylight simulation and optimization considering some shading surfaces designed in Rhino and i´m using the "HoneyBee EP context Surfaces" component. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jCEO2AQNowcgZn*mEVSFR2vfx87sDpCcS1PZEsjERkrrKM-KyTGZBAjVtNal1GBjxo76*jmNY*ehNbV98u*HUpAVHHVmdnD4/1.JPG) As you can see the problem is that my "shading surfaces" in input are trimmed and untrimmed surfaces, because for my optimization i want them to rotate and to change their depths, but that makes the error in the "HoneyBee EP context Surfaces" component (error: **"NoneType" object has no attribute "faces"**), while if i had referenced brep in input i wouldn´t have any problem. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/jCEO2AQNowej2LThTyW*y1O2rAzcLmia*RHkHKXfCPly25gHmLIsHh6kSlb75bYEl535sgUCxrFGJd7uq*yrut4F8oH2DM8k/2.JPG) What should i do if i want to maintain all the geometry changes? Thanks in advanced Claudia
topic: HoneyBee EP context Surfaces_(Un)Trimmed surfaces problem

replies.body:
Claudia,

Your luck chances will increase if you attach the example file :-)

-A.

Hi Abraham!

Here there are the files. 

I´ve just started with these plugins and programs so i´m really sorry if i often ask something here.. You have been always really helpful

Thanks a lot in advance

Claudia
If you're running a daylighting simulation just use createHBSrfs component to create the context surfaces. Context component is mostly useful for energy simulation.

Hi Mostapha, 

thanks a lot for your reply!

I´m trying to use that component you said but if i have shading with a certain transmittance, where should i put it? Because in the previous component i had the "EPTransSchedule" input, but now i haven´t. Any suggestion? maybe with the EPContruction input?

Anyway i´m running both simulation, the daylighting one and the energy one. 

Is still better use that component?

Thanks in advance

Claudia

You need to create a radiance material. [Here](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Honeybee_Grid-based_Daylight_Simulation_Example_III) is an example.
